live_updates: Teams have completed removal of damaged equipment and have begun installation of replacements. Your services may be intermittent as this work is completed but we will continue working to get everyone back up as soon as possible!
Teams are making progress on getting everyone back online.  Your services may be intermittent as this work is completed but we will continue working to get everyone back up as soon as possible!

31360.summary: Some customers in Surrey are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
31360.title: Jan 3 - Surrey | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Teams have resolved the issues in the area. If you are still having issues with services please check out the wide variety of self-serve support options off this website.
